Reviews.Title: Great windows 7 laptop
Reviews.Author: Sky
Reviews.Content: It is standard business laptop from Acer. It includesTPM, DAS drive protection,docking support,etc. The fan is silent and no warmer than other models. It can be free upgrade to windows 8. But I prefer not to.

ProductInfo.Features:
CPU:Intel  Core  i3-2348M (3MB Intel  Smart Cache, 2.30GHz)
4 GB DDR3 - 500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
3 x USB 3.0 (1 with power-off charging) - 1 x USB 2.0/eSATA - 1 x VGA - 1 x HDMI
Intel HD Graphics 3000 - Thin and Light NO Optical Drive
Windows 7 Professional
ProductInfo.Name: Acer TravelMate P6 TMP633-M-6639 13-Inch Notebook Intel Core i3 4GB Memory 500GB HDD Windows 7 Professional 64-bit
